title: C08L Asset Tracker
metaDesc: C08L 4G Asset Tracker with ultra-long battery life, ideal for trailer and container tracking.
fullDescription: Designed for asset risk control, the C08L integrates GPS/BeiDou/GLONASS triple-mode positioning with low power consumption, real-time monitoring, and remote control capabilities. It is the ideal solution for reliable cargo tracking and vehicle security, featuring a robust design with anti-removal protection and OTA remote management.
features: Precision Positioning: Triple-mode (GPS/BeiDou/GLONASS) with <10m error and AGPS support
Low Power Design: Auto-sleep mode with vibration-triggered activation
Advanced Security: Remote fuel/power cutoff, anti-tamper alerts, and anti-fake base station detection
Robust Reliability: Anti-removal SIM slot, dual hardware/software protection, defect rate <3‰
Customization Ready: Supports JT808 protocol and private customization
Smart Management: OTA updates, SMS/APP configuration, and real-time status analysis
packaging: 1x C08L Tracker, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x User Guide
